frameDefinitions: This frame describes either the creation of a Flame by a Kindler or non-sentient Cause, or the igniting of Flammables by a Kindler or a Cause.
A Self_mover begins a journey at a Source location, in a particular Directiongenerally setting out with an Intended_goal in mind.
A Speaker addresses an Audience on a particular Topic.
A System interacts with the environment (which may include a volitional agent) and goes into operation in accordance with its intended purpose.
A Cause triggers a System to operate in accordance with its intended purpose.
An Agent initiates the beginning of an ongoing Activity in which he will be continuously involved. '' 'At the same time, city-states began to grow in influence on the southern Greek mainland.'
frameExamples: Taliban militants recently <t>set fire</t> to several schools.
At about 1:00 in the morning, climbers <t>set out</t> for the summit.
McNamara <t>addressed</t> congress on the state of affairs of the Department of Defense.
The alarm <t>went off</t> as she walked through the entrance.
Smoking a cigarette will normally not <t>set off</t> a smoke alarm.
At the same time, city-states <t>began</t> to grow in influence on the southern Greek mainland.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Kindler</fen> is the person performing the intentional act.
The <fen>Flame</fen> is what is created by the Kindler.
The Flamables is the the object that is set on fire by the Kindler.
The cause of the fire.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event takes place.
This is the entity which moves under its own power.

Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>. In prepositional phrases, the prepositional object expresses the starting point of motion. In particles, the starting point of motion is understood from context.
The time at which the motion takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the motion (which is specified by a <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen>) is located.
The person or persons to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers their text.
The person who orally delivers a text about a <fen>Topic</fen> to a passive <fen>Audience</fen>.
What the text that the <fen>Speaker</fen> produces is about.
The <fen>Time</fen> describes when the speaking occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the speaking occurs.
The <fen>System</fen> interacts with the environment and activates.
The time when the <fen>System</fen> triggers.
Where the <fen>System</fen> goes off.
The <fen>Cause</fen> interacts with the <fen>System</fen> such that conditions are met for the <fen>System</fen> to operate.
The <fen>System</fen> interacts with or detects the <fen>Cause</fen> and activates.
An entity which participates in a <fen>Cause</fen>, perhaps volitionally and perhaps not.
The time when the triggering takes place.
Where the triggering takes place.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> that an <fen>Agent</fen> starts.
This role identifies the being that starts the intentional <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> starts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> starts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Mark</fex> started the fire with a magnifying glass.
He lectured <fex>to the officers of the Scots Guard</fex>  in  1929.
<fex>You</fex> have to sermonize about the good times
He was the Director: he could lecture <fex>on whomever he liked</fex>.
<fex>The device</fex> triggered as she walked through the arch.
The alarm went off <fex>at three o'clock today</fex>.
Police came running downstairs when the metal detector went off <fex>at the county courthouse</fex>.
<fex>His presence</fex> set off the motion alarms.
They let him through even though something triggered <fex>the metal detector</fex>?
<fex>She</fex> set off the silent alarm before being shoved into the middle of the lobby.
Three bombs were set off <fex>at three o'clock today</fex>.
Police came running downstairs when someone set off the metal detector <fex>at the county courthouse</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the seventh day of a week
only a few tens of miles
Friday the 13th to simply the seventh day of the week
a Friday the 13th of past years
Perpetuum Mobile: About the history of Perpetual Motion Machines
the Israeli Air Force Technical School
